mapper.insert: insert into menu (name, path, parent_id, menu_type, visible, `icon`, sequence, remark, permission, created_by, created_at, updated_at, is_link, state) values (#{name}, #{path}, #{parentId}, #{menuType}, #{visible}, #{icon}, #{sequence}, #{remark}, #{permission}, #{createBy}, now(), now(), #{isLink}, #{state})
mapper.update: update menu set `name`=#{name}, `path`=#{path}, `parent_id`=#{parentId}, `sequence`=#{sequence}, `remark`=#{remark}, `icon`=#{icon}, `visible`=#{visible}, `menu_type`=#{menuType}, `permission`=#{permission}, `updated_by` = #{updatedBy}, `updated_at` = now(), `is_link`=#{isLink}, `state`=#{state}, where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select distinct a.* from menu a inner join role_menu_rel b on a.id = b.menu_id inner join user_role_rel c on c.role_id = b.role_id where c.user_id = #{userId}
